attributes.action: Pay more than minimum wage to care home staff
attributes.additional_details: Put pressure on care home management and owners to pay more.
attributes.background: Through this awful time care home staff have been on the front line looking after elderly people and putting themselves at risk of contracting covid 19 and all for minimum wage or slightly above. This has to change.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase minimum wage for social care staff to £10.72: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316909

Raise the minimum wage for Domiciliary Care Workers to £12 per hour immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314394
